channel.title: [PI]Message To All When Player Gets A 99?[PI]

item.title: [PI]Message To All When Player Gets A 99?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

How do I make it so a message is sent to all when a person gets a 99?

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +" has just achieved 99 (Skill here)!"); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Message To All When Player Gets A 99?[PI]
